Promotion and protection of human rights: human

improving the effective enjoyment of human rights and

Russian Federation: amendment to draft resolution A/C.3/80/L.50 
 
 
 
 Protection of and assistance to internally displaced persons 
 
 
 
In the twenty-eighth preambular paragraph, delete “and recalling the relevant 
provisions of the Rome Statute of the International Criminal Court* that define the 
deportation or forcible transfer of population as a crime against humanity and the 
unlawful deportation, transfer or ordering of the displacement of the civilian population 
as war crimes,”. 
 
 
 
* United Nations, Treaty Series, vol. 2187, No. 38544.
